Text:
This is our music and we freely and willingly give it away to the world. We want to distribute our music exclusively through TPB but feel free to share it on other great sites too.

If our noise pleases you, let us know.
ifrobindies xxx

MEDIA LOBBYIST WARNING: any action you take against The Pirate Bay will be harming our ability to freely distribute our uncopywrighted music and side-step your evil industry. You will be liable for repairing the gapping hole in the lives of everyone who didn't get a chance to hear our music for free because of your actions. Stop fighting it and find a better way to monetise the new era of innovation in media distribution or go fuck yourselves.
